lines: Mi tasa cho pasa.
Are you an angel?
An angel. I heard the deep space pilots talk about them. They're the most beautiful creatures in the universe. They live on the Moons of Viego I think.
I listen to all the traders and star pilots who come through here. I'm a pilot you know, and someday I'm gonna fly away from this place.
Mmhmm. All my life.
Since I was very little. Three, I think. My mom and I were sold to Gardulla the hutt. But she lost us betting on the podraces.
I'm a person and my name is Anakin.
Hey, hit the nose!
Wouldn't have lasted long anyways if I wasn't so good at building things.
I was glad to meet you too!
Galoba numa toffa.
Yippee!
Chesko sebulba, chipoka umin gisa. Mi tisa radiko panna pa chopchowa.
Eh chabbata do mullay rah.
Hi.
Your buddy was here was about to be turned into orange goo. He picked a fight with a Dug, an especially dangerous Dug called Sebulba.
Here, you'll like these pallies. Here.
Do you have shelter?
Is it far?
You'll never reach the outskirts in time. Sandstorms are very, very dangerous. C'mon, I'll take you to my place.
Mom, mom I'm home!
These are my friends mom.
I'm building a droid, you want to see?
C'mon, I'll show you 3PO.
Isn't he great? He's not finished yet.
You really like him? He's a protocol droid to help mom. Watch.
Oops.
When the storm is over, I'll show you my racer. I'm building a podracer.
I've been working on a scanner to try to locate mine.
And they blow you up! Boom!
Has anybody ever seen a podrace?
I'm the only human who can do it.
You're a jedi knight, aren't you?
I saw your laser sword. Only jedis carry that kind of weapon.
I don't think so. No one can kill a jedi.
I had a dream I was a jedi. I came back here and freed all the slaves.
I think you have. Why else would you be here?
How did you end up here in the outer rim?
I can help. I can fix anything.
I built a racer. It's the fastest ever. There's a big race tomorrow on Boonta Eve. You can enter my pod.
Watto doesn't know I've built it. You could make him think it's your and get me to pilot it for you.
But mom, I love it. The prize money would more than pay for the parts you need.
Mom you say the biggest problem in this universe is nobody helps each other.
It wasn't my fault. Really! Sebulba flashed me with his vents. I actually saved the pod... mostly.
That isn't the half of it. I'm in the Bunta race tomorrow.
Hey Jar Jar, keep away from those energy binders. If your hand get caughts in the beam it's gonna go numb for hours.
It will.
Yes sir!
It's working! It's working!
There's so many. Do they all have a system of planets?
Has anyone been to them all?
Not at all.
You fell into that nightmare master, and I rescued you, remember?
I haven't seen her in ten years, master.
So have you. Well, for a senator I mean.
We will find out who's trying to kill you padme, I promise you.
I meant that in the interest of protecting her master, of course.
Why?
Why else do you think we were assigned to her if not to find the killer. Protection is a job for local security, not jedi. It's overkill master, investigation is implied in our mandate.
She hardly even recognized me Jar Jar. I thought about her every day since we parted, and she's forgotten me completely.
Quite as a tune. I don't like just waiting here for something to happen to her.
Oh she covered the cameras. I don't think she liked me watching her.
She programmed R2 to warn us if there is an intruder.
We also want to catch this assassin don't we master?
It was her idea. Don't worry, no harm will come to her. I can sense everything going on in that room. Trust me.
And yours are?
I don't sleep well anymore.
I don't why I keep dreaming about her.
I'd much rather dream about Padme. Just being around her again is intoxicating.
She's not like the others in the senate, master.
Not another lecture. At least not on the economics of politics.
And besides, you're generalizing. The chancellor doesn't appear to be corrupt.
I think he's a good man. My...
Stay here!
Oh you know master, I couldn't find a speeder that I really liked, with an open cockpit and the right speed capabilities.
I thought I already did.
Ah hah haaha
Sorry master. I forgot you don't like flying.
Master if we keep this chase going that perp is going to end up deep fried, and personally I'd like to find out who he is, and who he's working for. This is a shortcut. I think.
I'm deeply sorry master.
If you'll excuse me.
She went into the club master!
Sorry master.
Yes master.
Yes master.
I try master.
Don't say that master. You're the closest thing I have to a father.
I am trying.
I think he is a she. And I think she's a changeling.
Where are you going master?
Jedi business, go back to your drinks.
Who hired you? Tell us. Tell us now!
As the leader of the opposition it will be very difficult to get Senator Amidala to leave the capital.
Thank you your excellency.
Your guidance more than my patience.
Thank you your excellency.
Don't worry, now that the council has ordered an investigation it won't take Master Obi-Wan long to find this bountyhunter.
Sometimes we must let go of our pride, and do what is requested of us.
Master Obi-Wan manages not to see it.
Don't get me wrong, Obi-Wan is a great mentor. As wise as Master Yoda, and as powerful as Master Windu.
I am truly thankful to be his apprentice. In some ways, a lot of ways, I'm really ahead of him. I'm ready for the trials, but he feels that I'm too unpredictable. He won't let me move on.
It's worse, he's overly critical, he never listens! He doesn't understand. It's not fair!
I know.
But I have grown up, you said it yourself.
Why not?
Sorry m'lady.
Yes master.
It's time to go.
May the force be with you, master.
This is my first assignment on my own, I am too.
Don't worry, we have R2 with us.
Or be with the people that I love.
Attachment is forbidden. Possession is forbidden. Compassion, which I would define as unconditional love is central to a jedi's life. So you might say that we are encouraged to love.
You haven't changed a bit. You're exactly the way I remember you in my dreams.
The people you served thought you did a good job. I heard they even tried to amend the constitution so you could stay in office.
I agree with her. I think the republic needs you. I'm glad that you chose to serve.
Hold on a minute.
Excuse me. I'm in charge of security here m'lady.
I'm sorry m'lady.
I don't like sand. It's coarse, and rough and irritating, and it gets everywhere. Not like here. Here everything's soft, and smooth.
I'm sorry.
Sure you do, you just don't want to tell me.
They only work on the weakminded.
Alright, I get the picture. Whatever happened to him?
Maybe he was the smart one.
I like two or three, but I'm not really sure about one of them. I don't think the system works.
We need a system where the polticians sit down and discuss the problem, agree what's in the best interest of all the people, and then do it.
Well then they should be made to.
I don't know, someone.
Of course not me.
Someone wise.
Well, if it works...
No, no, I'd be much to frightened to tease a senator.
When I got to them, we got into aggressive negotiations.
Ah well, negotiations with a lightsaber.
If Master Obi-Wan caught me doing this he'd be very grumpy.

From the moment I met you, all those years ago, not a day has gone by when I haven't thought of you. And now that I'm with you again, I'm in agony. The closer I get to you the worse it gets. The thought of not being with you... I can't breath. I'm haunted by the kiss that you should never have given me. My heart is beating, hoping that that kiss will not become a scar. You are in my very soul, tormenting me. What can I do? I will do anything that you ask. If you are suffering as much as I am please tell me.
Anything is possible just listen to me.
Then you do feel something.
You're asking me to be rational. That is something I know I cannot do. Believe me, I wish I could just wish away my feelings, but I can't.
Well you know it... wouldn't have to be that way. We could keep it a secret.
No. You're right. It would destroy us.
No. No. Mom, no. No.
Don't go.
Your presence is soothing.
Jedi don't have nightmares.
I saw my mother. She's suffering Padmé. I saw her as clearly as I see you now.
She's in pain. I know I'm disobeying my mandate to protect you senator, but I have to go. I have to help her.
I'm sorry, I don't have a choice.
Wait right there.
Chut chut Watto. Ding mi chassa hopa.
Mi boschka di Shmi Skywalker
My mother.
You sold her?
Do you know where they are now?
I'd like to know.
3PO?
I've come to see my mother.
I'm Anakin Skywalker.
Is my mother here?
To find my mother.
You're gonna have to stay here. These are good people Padmé. You'll be safe.
I won't be long.
Mom... mom...
I'm here mom. You're safe.
I missed you.
Stay with me mom.
The shifter broke. Life seems so much simpler when you're fixing things. I'm good at fixing things, always was. But I cou... Why'd she have to die? Why couldn't I save her? I know I could have.
Well I should be. Someday I will be. I will be the most powerful jedi ever. I promise you. I will even learn to stop people from dying.
It's all Obi-Wan's fault. He's jealous. He's holding me back.

I... I killed them. I killed them all. They're dead. Every single one of them. And not just the men. But the women. And the children too. They're like animals, and I slaughtered them like animals. I hate them.
I'm a jedi. I know I'm better than this.
I wasn't strong enough to save you mom. I wasn't strong enough. But I promise, I won't fail again.
I miss you... so much.
Understood master.
If he's still alive.
He's like my father. But you heard Master Windu, he gave me strict orders to stay here.
That'l do.
Don't worry, I've given up trying to argue with you.
Wait.
Padmé!
Not again. Obi-Wan is gonna kill me.
Don't be afraid.
What are you talking about?
You love me? I thought that we had decided not to fall in love. That we would be forced to live a lie, and that it would destroy our lives.
I retransmitted it just as you had requested Master. Then we decided to come rescue you.
I've got a bad feeling about this.
What about Padmé?
Jump!
You call this a diplomatic solution?
Aim right above the fuel cells.
It's Dooku! Shoot him down!
Follow him!
Padmé!
Put the ship down!
Lower the ship.
I don't care, put the ship down.
I can't leave her.
She would do her duty.
You're gonna pay for all the jedi you killed today Dooku.
No I'll take him now.
I am a slow learner.
Lock onto him R2. Master, General Grievous's ship is directly ahead. The one crawling with vulture droids.
This is where the fun begins.
I'm gonna go help them out.
Missiles. Pull up.
They're coming around.
Surge all power units R2 stand by. Reverse thrusters.
We got ‘em R2.
Buzz droids.
Move to the right so I can get a clear shot at them.
I agree, bad idea.
Move to the right.
I'm not leaving without you master.
Hit ‘em R2. Watch out.
Yeah, you got ‘em!
The general's command ship is dead ahead.
Sorry master.
I sense Count Dooku.
Next move?
R2 go back, I need you to stay with the ship.
Destroyers.
No, did you?
Well there's more than one way out of here.
What was that all about?
Hey hey, no loose wire jokes.
He's trying.
Are you alright?
I was about to say that.
My powers have doubled since the last time we met Count.
I shouldn't.
Yes but he was an unarmed prisoner. I shouldn't have done that, it's not the Jedi way.
He seems to be alright.
His fate will be the same as ours.
Elevator's not working.
R2, activate elevator 3224.
Easy, we're in a bit of a situation here.
Hold on.
Uh, oops. R2, shut down the elevator.
R2 get down here.
R2, do you copy.
Ray shields.
Apparently not. I say patience.
Yes, R2 will be along in a few moments and then he'll release the ray shields.
See? No problem.
General Grievous. You're shorter than I expected.
All the escape pods have been launched.
You mean do I know how to land what's left of this thing.
Well under the circumstances I'd say the ability to pilot this thing is irrelevant.
Strap yourselves in.
Open all hatches. Extend all flaps and drag fins.
We lost something.
Now we're really picking up speed.
Grab that. Keep us level.
Easy R2.
We're coming in too hot.
Are you coming master?
Hold on, this whole operation was your idea.
All because of your training.
Alright, but you owe me one. And not for saving your skin for the tenth time.
Thank you, senator Organa.
But the fighting will continue until General Grievous is spare parts.
Excuse me.
I've missed you, Padme.
I'm all right.
It feels like we've been apart for a lifetime.
And it might have been, if the chancellor hadn't been kidnapped.
I don't think they would have ever brought us back from the outer rim sieges.
Yes, here.
I'm tired of all this deception. I don't care if they know we're married.
Are you all right? You're trembling.
What's going on?
That's… that's wonderful.
We're not gonna worry about anything right now. All right?
This is a happy moment.
The happiest moment of my life.
You're so… beautiful.
No… no it's because I'm so in love with you.
Well, that's not exactly what I meant.
Nothing.
I remember when I gave this to you.
It was a dream.
Like the ones I used to have about my mother, just before she died.
And it was about you.
It was only a dream.
You die in childbirth.
I don't know.
I won't let this one become real.
I know, I know.
We don't need his help. Our baby is a blessing.
They're of pain, suffering. Death.
Someone.
Yes.
I won't let these visions come true master Yoda.
What must I do master?
I'm sorry, I was held up. I have no excuse.
What's wrong then?
Well that can only mean less deliberating and more action. Is that bad?
It'll make it easier for us to end this war.
Be careful of what?
What for?
He didn't inform the council? That's unusual isn't it?
Of course.
What do you mean?
For what? I don't understand.
Me? A master? I'm overwhelmed, sir.
But the council elects its own members, they'll never accept this.
I understand.
What?
How can you do this? This is outrageous. It's unfair. How can you be on the council and not be a master?
Forgive me, master.
What kind of nonsense is this? Put me on the council and not make me a master? It's never been done in the history of the Jedi. It's insulting.
I swear to you, I didn't ask to be put on the council.
That has nothing to do with this.
And?
What situation?
They want me to spy on the Chancellor? But that's treason.
Why didn't the council give me this assignment when we were in session?
The chancellor is not a bad man Obi-Wan. He befriended me, he's watched over me ever since I arrived here.
The senate demanded that he stay longer.
You're asking me to do something against the Jedi code. Against the Republic, against a mentor, and a friend. That's what's out of place here. Why are you asking this of me?
Sometimes I wonder what's happening to the Jedi order. I think this war is destroying the principles of the Republic.
What do you mean?
I don't believe that. And you're sounding like a separatist.
Don't ask me to do that. Make a motion in the senate, where that kind of a request belongs.
Nothing.
You wanted to see me chancellor.
At last. We'll be able to capture that monster and end this war.
I'm not sure I understand.
I don't think that.
I know they don't trust you.
I have to admit, my trust in them has been shaken.
I don't… I don't know what to say.
The Jedi use their power for good.
The Sith rely on their passion for their strength. They think inwards, only about themselves.
The Jedi are selfless. They only care about others.
No.
He could actually save people from death?
What happened to him?
Is it possible to learn this power?
A partial message was intercepted in a diplomatic packet from the chairman of Utapau.
The chancellor has requested that I lead the campaign.
You're gonna need me on this one master.
Master, I've disappointed you. I haven't been very appreciative of your training. I've been arrogant and I apologize. I've just been so frustrated with the council.
Obi-Wan, may the Force be with you.
Obi-Wan's been here hasn't he.
What did he want?
I feel lost.
Obi-Wan and the council don't trust me.
Something's happening. I'm not the Jedi I should be. I want more. And I know I shouldn't.
I found a way to save you.
From my nightmares.
I won't lose you, Padme.
No I promise you.
Yes master.
Chancellor. We have just received a report from General Kenobi. He has engaged General Grievous.
I should be there with him.
I wish I knew. More and more I get the feeling that I'm being excluded from the council. I know there are things about the Force that they're not telling me.
How do you know the ways of the Force?
You know the Dark Side?
What did you say?
You're the Sith lord.
I would certainly like to.
I'm going to turn you over to the Jedi council.
I will quickly discover the truth of all this.
Master Windu, I must talk to you.
He won't give up his power. I've just learned a terrible truth. I think Chancellor Palpatine is a Sith lord.
Yes. The one we've been looking for.
He knows the ways of the force. He's been trained to use the dark side.
Absolutely.
Master, the chancellor is very powerful. You'll need my help if you're going to arrest him.
I must go, master.
Yes, master.
No, he must stand trial.
It's not the Jedi way. He must live.
I need him.
What have I done?
I will do whatever you ask.
Just help me save Padme's life. I can't live without her.
I pledge myself to your teachings.
Thank you, my master.
I agree. The council's next move will be against the senate.
I understand, master.
What about the other Jedi spread across the galaxy?
I'm fine. I came to see if you and the baby are safe.
The Jedi have tried to overthrow the republic.
I saw Master Windu attempt to assassinate the chancellor myself.
I will not betray the republic. My loyalties lie with the chancellor, and with the senate, and with you.
I don't know. Many Jedi have been killed. We can only hope that he's remained loyal to the chancellor.

Have faith my love. Everything will soon be set right. The chancellor has given me a very important mission. The separatists have gathered on the Mustafa system. I'm going there to end  this war. Wait for me until I return. Things will be different I promise. Please, wait for me.
R2, stay with the ship.
The separatists have been taken care of, my master.
Very good, my lord.
I saw your ship. What are you doing out here?
What things?
Obi-Wan is trying to turn you against me.
Us?
Love won't save you, Padme. Only my new powers can do that.
I won't lose you the way I lost my mother. I am becoming more powerful than any Jedi has ever dreamed of and I'm doing it for you. To protect you.

Don't you see? We don't have to run away anymore. I have brought peace to the republic. I am more powerful than the chancellor. I can overthrow him. And together you and I can rule the galaxy, make things the way we want them to be.
I don't want to hear anymore about Obi-Wan. The Jedi turned against me. Don't you turn against me.
Because of Obi-Wan?
Liar!
You're with him! You brought him here to kill me.
You turned her against me!
You will not take her from me!
Don't lecture me Obi-Wan. I see through the lies of the Jedi. I do not fear the dark side as you do. I have brought peace, freedom, justice, and security to my new empire.
Don't make me kill you.
If you're not with me then you're my enemy.
You will try.
I should have known the Jedi were plotting to take over.
From my point of view the Jedi are evil.
This is the end for you, my master.
You underestimate my power.
I hate you!
Yes, master. Where is Padme? Is she safe? Is she all right?
I? I couldn't have. She was alive. I felt it!
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!
